H0.text: Taxonomy is the science of classifying living things.

H1.text: Methodology is the science of classifying living things.

H2.text: Terminology is the science of classifying living things.

H3.text: Botany is the science of classifying living things.

A4.text: In biology, taxonomy ... is the scientific study of naming, defining (circumscribing) and classifying groups of biological organisms based on shared characteristics.

A5.text: The science of classification, in biology the arrangement of organisms into a classification
